fulltext:
. 
1 
                   TRAN TIEU MY 
Mobile: 0979 920 357 
Email: tieumy1512@gmail.com 
Age: 28 
6 year experiences in B2B & B2C Sales 
A. CAREER SUMMARY 
   Aug 19 – Present 
: INTERSPACE VIETNAM COMPANY (Advertising Platform)  
Business Development Team Leader. 
 
Jun 18 – Jun 19 
: SWANCITY DEVELOPMENT COMPANY (Real Estate) 
Senior Sales Executive. 
 
Jun 16 – April 18 
: VIETNAMWORKS – NAVIGOS GROUP (Recruitment Services) 
Senior Business Development Executive.  
 
Feb 13 – May 16  
: SAIGON APARTMENT OFFICE SERVICE COMPANY  
Leasing Office Team Leader. 
B. 
WORKING EXPERIENCES & QUALIFICATIONS IN DETAILS  
1. 
Working Experience 
Aug 19 – Present 
INTERSPACE VIETNAM COMPANY  
                                 Business Development Team Leader 
Main duties 
- 
Manage a team with at least 2 Business Development Executive. 
- 
In charge of team performance & KPI which assigned by Manager. 
- 
In charge of recruiting, training, coaching for team members. 
- 
Focus on B2B, especially big clients. 
- 
Perform cost-benefit and needs analysis of existing/potential customers to meet their needs. 
- 
Establish, develop and maintain positive business and customer relationships. 
- 
Expedite the resolution of customer problems and complaints to maximize satisfaction. 
- 
Achieve agreed upon sales targets and outcomes within schedule. 
2 
- 
Make daily/ weekly/ monthly report for own performance. 
Jun 18 – Jun 19 
SWANCITY DEVELOPMENT COMPANY – CFLD GROUP 
Senior Sales Executive 
Main duties 
- 
Responsible for sales targets, turnover assigned by projects and by months  
- 
Develop and maintain relationship with current customers and build up potential buyers  
- 
Organize, coordinate and implement of sales programs and events 
- 
Creating a good and professional impression to customers  
- 
Liaise with clients to provide proposals  
- 
Research, explore and make sales markets  
- 
Preparing necessary documents for completing the contract and following up payment process  
Achievement 
- 
One of 7 Sales Consultant could closed special deal. 
- 
Top best seller in June 2018. 
Jun 16 – April 18 
VIETNAMWORKS – NAVIGOS GROUP 
                                           Senior Business Development Executive  
Main duties 
- 
Manage and develop a potential and extensive customer’s database.  
- 
Making market research, build network to get new potential clients 
- 
Reach out to potential customers via phone, email, face to face, meeting customers and delivering 
excellent sales presentations. 
- 
Negotiating service contract, explain, and advise for clients to assure client's highest satisfaction 
- 
Being responsible for individual sales target of corporate clients and supporting team to hit team 
target. 
- 
Retaining, up-sell/gross-sell existing customers and create new customers 
- 
Following up with clients to solve problems if any 
- 
Cooperating with Marketing department on designing Landing page for client and running digital 
marketing campaigns, keep track and weekly report the efficiency sales performance report 
weekly, ensuring the timeline and efficiency. 
- 
Consult customers on effective use of VietnamWorks services and closing Purchase Order. 
3 
- 
Planning strategy and build master plan for Sales Team. 
- 
Be a second in charge for Line Manager. Supporting and planning, which help members achieve 
their daily target. 
- 
Be a Mentor, training and coaching the new comers and junior level.  
- 
Collecting monthly promotion from competitors and suggest strategy for the next attractive 
promotion. 
Achievements 
- 
Achieved: over 130% Target Billed Revenue 2017 
- 
Biggest contract of the Month (June 2017) 
- 
Quarterly Flexible Contest. 
Feb 13 – May 2016  
SAIGON APARTMENT OFFICE SERVICE COMPANY 
Leasing Office Team Leader 
Main duties 
- 
Cooperating and supporting marketing online, seo web. 
- 
Doing business development. 
- 
Preparing the quotation and consulting services, closing purchase order. 
- 
Reviewing the contracts and support customers to negotiate with investors. 
- 
Build up customer database, take care of current customers and follow up potential customers. 
- 
Be responsible for training new staffs in my team and support them to solve difficult problems 
and closing purchase order. 
- 
Planning strategy and build master plan for Sales Team. 
- 
Reporting to Sales Director 
Achievements 
- 
Get highest revenue in 2015. 
- 
Biggest leasing office contract of the year. 
2. 
Education 
2009 – 2013 
Ho Chi Minh University of Technology 
Bachelor degree in Accounting and Auditing 
Grade: Good 
Jan 12 
Vietnam National University - Ho Chi Minh City Campus 
Intermediate level B (Microsoft Access) 
4 
May 15 
The Institute of Asian Studies - The Centre of Economics Development  
Professional Marketer 
Mar 17 
Pace Institute of Management 
Critical Thinking and Problem Solving Skills 
2016 – 2018 
Internal Training Programs for TeleSales 
Selling Skills and Sales Process - T.R.U.S.T (Zig Ziglar) 
Leadership, Breakthrough success (Brian Tracy) 
Master Your Time (Brian Tracy) 
Master Your Mind (Brian Tracy) 
Sales team management - Talent pool 
SKILLS 
- 
Computer skills  
o 
Deeply understanding Marketing Online, Accounting software, Tax software, Adobe 
Photoshop and Statistic software. 
o 
Proficiency in Microsoft Office applications (Word, Excel, Power Point).  
- 
Language skill 
o 
English 
 Being good at commercial communication 
 Skilled at negotiation and take care of foreign customers. 
o 
Chinese: 
 Being at elementary level. 
- 
Soft skills  
o 
Skilled at  Leadership, Interpersonal and Analytical 
o 
Good customner-oriented and sales skill: presentation, persuasion and negotiation 
o 
Problem analysis and solving skills  
o 
Quick-learner and self-motivated 
o 
Being good at teamwork and able to work independently 
o 
Ability to manage time effectively, cope with difficult and get along with changes quickly 
o 
Ability to perform well under high pressure and meet tight deadline
